## XPaths Modified

### Description
Backward incompatible change: added nat-ip related validations.

### Reason
The field has been unused before the introduction of Mobility NAT feature in 17.1

/mobility-cfg-data/mobility-config/mmcfg/mobility-peers/mobility-peer/nat-ip
/mobility-cfg-data/mobility-config/mmcfg/mobility-peers/mobility-peer/ip-addr
